idea-plugin.name: File Nesting
idea-plugin.description:
Advanced file nesting for JetBrains IDEs, similar to VS Code's file nesting feature. Groups related configuration files under their parent file in the Project View:
  • package.json groups .eslintrc, tsconfig.json, .prettierrc, lock files, etc.
  • README groups LICENSE, CHANGELOG, CONTRIBUTING, etc.
  • Dockerfile groups docker-compose files, .dockerignore, etc.
  • And many more patterns for common development tools
Can be toggled on/off in Settings → Appearance → File Nesting.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
